name: spo-get-message-centre-announcements-and-post-to-teams-channel
title: Retrieve Message Center announcements and post to MS Teams channel
shortDescription: This script allows you to retrieve Message Center announcements and post to MS Teams channel.
longDescription: This script allows you to connect to your SharePoint Online tenant and retrieve Message Center announcements.
It then connects to Microsoft Teams and loops through the announcements, posting them to a specific MS Teams channel.

thumbnails.alt: Retrieve Message Center announcements and post to MS Teams channel
